description: portrait of a man wearing a ruff in an oval cartouche with a sculptured pedestal below oval and a medallion in lower center of oval
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [JAC. AVG THANVS IN SUPREMA PARISIENSI CURIA PRÆSES INFVLATUS/ Juxta exemplar tabellæ (Vulgo Pastel) ex pinacotheca Illustrissimi/ Abbatis Jacobi Augusti Nepotis  J. Chereau Sculp]; in pencil LRC:[1-270]
title: Portrait of Jacques Augustus Thurani
